weapon_description: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.
weapon_skill_description: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.
